p: Ferulic acid is the main phytoconstituent in F. assafoetida. It can increase the activity of glucokinase, hinder glucosidase inside the gut, and inhibit oxidation response [ 220, 221]. In addition, umbelliferone had an antihyperlipidemic potential. It decreased plasma glucose, accelerated insulin level, and decreased insulin resistance, all of which were better under diabetic conditions [ 221]. The alternative factor is flavonol quercetin, which may probably control hyperglycemia and growth hexokinase, reduce glucose-6-phosphatase and fructose-bis phosphatase sports, and possesses Î±-glucosidase interest [ 221].
